tasks.name: Daily Startup Funding Intelligence
tasks.description: Track significant startup funding rounds and investment trends

largest_funding_round.description: The largest funding round announced today with company name, amount, and lead investor

notable_series_a.description: Most interesting Series A funding with company description and investor rationale

unicorn_update.description: Any new unicorn valuations or major valuation changes in existing unicorns

sector_trending.description: Industry sector receiving the most funding activity today

investor_spotlight.description: Most active VC firm or notable investor moves today

geographic_hotspot.description: Geographic region with significant funding activity

funding_stage_trend.description: Whether early-stage or late-stage funding is more active

notable_acquihire.description: Any acquihires or talent acquisitions announced

failed_funding.description: Companies that shut down or had funding issues

emerging_technology.description: New technology categories getting investor attention

tasks.input: Analyze today's startup funding landscape. Find the largest funding rounds, notable Series A investments, new unicorns, trending sectors, active investors, geographic patterns, and any company failures or pivots. Focus on actionable investment intelligence.

tasks.name: Daily Product Launch Intelligence
tasks.description: Monitor significant product launches and feature releases across industries

major_product_launch.description: Most significant product launch today with company, product details, and target market

tech_feature_release.description: Notable software feature or platform update from major tech companies

competitive_response.description: Companies responding to competitor launches or market moves

market_disruption_potential.description: Product launch with highest potential to disrupt existing markets

enterprise_solution.description: New B2B or enterprise product launch

consumer_app_launch.description: Notable consumer app or service launch

hardware_announcement.description: Significant hardware product or device launch

pricing_strategy.description: Interesting pricing model or strategy from new launches

partnership_enabled_launch.description: Product launch enabled by strategic partnerships

beta_program_start.description: Notable beta programs or early access initiatives launched

tasks.input: Track today's most significant product launches, feature releases, and market introductions across all industries. Focus on competitive intelligence, market disruption potential, pricing strategies, and strategic implications for businesses.

tasks.name: Daily Regulatory Impact Monitor
tasks.description: Scan for regulatory changes affecting business operations and compliance

new_regulation_announced.description: Most significant new regulation or policy announced today

compliance_deadline.description: Upcoming compliance deadlines or implementation dates

industry_most_affected.description: Industry sector facing the biggest regulatory changes

enforcement_action.description: Major regulatory enforcement actions or penalties announced

international_policy.description: International regulatory changes affecting global business

data_privacy_update.description: Data privacy or cybersecurity regulation updates

financial_regulation.description: Banking, fintech, or financial services regulatory changes

tasks.input: Monitor today's regulatory developments across all sectors including new policies, compliance deadlines, enforcement actions, and international regulatory changes. Focus on business impact and operational implications.

tasks.name: Global Supply Chain Intelligence
tasks.description: Track supply chain disruptions and logistics developments worldwide

major_disruption_event.description: Most significant supply chain disruption or crisis today

shipping_route_impact.description: Major shipping route delays, closures, or capacity changes

commodity_shortage.description: Critical material or component shortages affecting industries

logistics_innovation.description: New logistics technology or process improvements announced

port_congestion_update.description: Major port congestion or capacity issues worldwide

trade_route_alternative.description: New trade routes or alternative supply sources being established

manufacturing_shift.description: Companies reshoring or relocating manufacturing operations

energy_transport_impact.description: Energy costs or availability affecting transportation and logistics

tasks.input: Analyze global supply chain disruptions, shipping delays, commodity shortages, port congestion, and logistics innovations. Focus on operational impact for businesses and alternative solutions being implemented.

tasks.name: M&A and Corporate Development Intelligence
tasks.description: Track merger, acquisition, and strategic corporate development activity

largest_deal_announced.description: Largest M&A transaction announced today with value and strategic rationale

strategic_acquisition.description: Most strategically significant acquisition for market positioning

ipo_update.description: IPO filings, pricing, or public debut performance

corporate_restructuring.description: Major corporate spinoffs, divestitures, or restructuring announcements

private_equity_activity.description: Major private equity buyouts or portfolio company exits

hostile_takeover_attempt.description: Hostile takeover bids or activist investor campaigns

deal_termination.description: Major deals that were cancelled or terminated

regulatory_approval.description: M&A deals receiving or denied regulatory approval

tasks.input: Monitor today's merger and acquisition activity, IPOs, corporate restructuring, private equity deals, and strategic corporate developments. Focus on deal value, strategic rationale, regulatory implications, and market consolidation trends.
